LanguageData.XFMParmor_MParmor_Statue.label: Mechframe project memorial
LanguageData.XFMParmor_MParmor_Statue.description:
The mechframe project memorial
Project lead: 旋风
Programmer: 旋风(andery233xj)
Artists; 青叶(AOBA)，Bill Doors(3HST有限公司)
Partial artistic support: 金兔子(金兔子拉面)
Programming advisor: 影兔(shadowrabbit)
Initial artistic support: Frolg(Frolg)
English localization: Bill Doors
English proofreader: Zeta04(Zeta04)
Chief tester: 塔洛斯(塔洛斯)
Testers: 落叶、22点下、冷月汐、苏馍、空曜、菜鸡兔、死萌、阿撒托斯、源、猫猫头、贰拾伍、东山大少、制冷、绗伊、自动回复机仆、霖和、暴雪的野望、起义时刻

Sponsors: 包泥泥、3HST、制冷、自动回复机仆、咸鱼、镜之精灵

This mod is the sum of devotion of every aforememtioned contributors.
